text:
I recently had a consultation regarding abnormal bleeding, and I couldn’t be more pleased with the care and professionalism I received. Dr Ng took the time to listen to my concerns, explain possible causes clearly, and walk me through the next steps.

He recommended a hysteroscope procedure to get a better look inside the uterus, and I felt completely reassured by how thoroughly everything was explained. Their calm and compassionate approach really helped ease my anxiety. I truly appreciate the thoughtful and attentive care—it made a stressful situation much easier to manage.

Dr Ng and his team exceeded my expectations. From the initial consultation (where fast appointment was given) to post procedure follow-ups, my fibroid removal experience has been smooth and stress-free. Thanks to Dr Ng's strong experience and expertise, coupled with his team's professionalism.

To add, the many thank-you cards and happy patients' images adorning the clinic say it all.. thank you Dr Ng!

I had a great experience at GynaeMD. The staff was friendly, and the clinic had a clean, welcoming atmosphere. Dr. Ng was thorough, professional, and made me feel comfortable during my check-up. The appointment was quick, and I didn’t have to wait long. Highly recommend this clinic for anyone seeking quality gynecological care!

Dr Christopher Ng performed my ovarian cyst removal and it went very well. He’s very skilled and meticulous, and made sure I was comfortable with everything from start to finish. My recovery was quick, and I’m feeling so much better now. Thanks Dr Ng.

I’ve been to many gynecologists, but GynaeMD stands out. The environment is peaceful, and the staff is very accommodating. Dr. Ng is knowledgeable and made me feel heard. He explained everything clearly and addressed all my concerns. A great experience overall!
